title: Sold -- FS Group of (5) SCD T206
author: scotgreb

posts.post_title: Sold -- FS Group of (5) SCD T206
posts.post_content:
I picked these up as part of a group from the recent BST auction -- was planning to crack or cross but decided against although the grades look pretty close IMO -- except maybe the Gilbert (extra paper on the back -- could need a soak). Priced at $250 (PayPal invoice) -- please PM any questions. Scott

Scott
